content.question: A projectile is moving vertically in the <math alttext="positive y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>+</mo><mi>y</mi></math>-direction, with acceleration in the <math alttext="negative y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mi>y</mi></math>-direction. Which of the following correctly describes the kinetic energy of the projectile?

choices.label: The kinetic energy is constant and equal to zero.
The kinetic energy is constant and nonzero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
